translation.en: ♪ You would hardly recognize me I'm so ♪
translation.ko: 넌 날 모르겠지만 난 참 기뻐

translation.en: ♪ How could a person like me Care for you? ♪
translation.ko: 어떻게 나 같은 사람이 널 좋아할 수 있지?

translation.en: ♪ Why do I bother ♪ -♪ When you're not the one for me? ♪ -Sh, sh.
-♪ Is enough enough? -[sings along] ♪ I saw the sign ♪
translation.ko: 그 정도면 충분해 난 징조를 봤거든

translation.en: ♪ And it opened up my eyes I saw the sign ♪
translation.ko: 그게 내 눈을 뜨게 해줬지 난 징조를 봤거든
전부 다 엉클 식스의 위폐 사업 하는 놈들이죠

translation.en: Most likely trafficked in from Fujian.
These animals will just have them replaced in the next shipment.
translation.ko: 이 개자식들은 다음번에 실어 올 여자로 바꾸면 그만이죠

translation.en: Doesn't speak English, and when I ask him in Canto,
he seems not to speak Chinese, either.
I said there wasn't gonna be a gang war.
translation.ko: 갱단 간의 전쟁은 없을 거라 했더니만

translation.en: I don't wanna fight with you.
-Enough. -What the fuck are you doing here?
translation.ko: - 그만해요 - 도대체 여기서 뭐 하는 거야?

translation.en: I just wanna share something with you. [grunts]
Hi, I'm at Jingletown, uh, by the docks.
Some Peeping Tom pervert just broke into my apartment.
translation.ko: 관음증 변태 놈이 제 아파트에 침입했어요

translation.en: I had a dream about you.
But I don't need to hear it.
translation.ko: 하지만 그걸 얘기로 듣고 싶진 않아

translation.en: Uncle Six is going to kill you.
He's the head of the Triad, in Chinatown.
I came here to warn you.
This have anything to do with Lu Xin?

translation.ko: 그가 널 산 채로 태울 거야

translation.en: I saw it in my dream.
And you saw this in, what,
I know how crazy this sounds.
translation.ko: 이게 얼마나 미친 소리로 들리는지 알아

translation.en: Just stay away from Uncle Six. And Nikki’s Steakhouse.
translation.ko: 엉클 식스와 엮이지 마 니키 스테이크하우스랑도

translation.en: -That’s where it happens. Trust me. -[sirens wailing]
Trust you? I barely fucking know you.
translation.ko: 널 믿으라고? 거의 알지도 못하는 인간을?

translation.en: -♪ Now feel them all the way ♪ -You remember anything else,
-call me. -♪ Now you see me come your way ♪
♪ Does my presence make you breathless? ♪

translation.ko: "뉴스 속보 차이나타운 화재" "차이나타운의 한 건물에 원인 미상의 화재 발생"

translation.en: It was utter chaos here, just two hours ago, as firefighters
translation.ko: 일대 혼란이 있었지만 두 시간 전에 소방대원들이 출동해

translation.en: raced to contain the blaze that started earlier this morning.
translation.ko: 이른 새벽에 발생한 불길을 잡으려 노력했습니다

translation.en: The fire claimed the lives of seven men,
believed to be leaders of Chinatown's most notorious gang.
translation.ko: 차이나타운의 악명 높은 갱단 보스들로 추정됩니다

translation.en: Authorities still have no idea what caused the mysterious fire.
translation.ko: 당국은 여전히 화재 원인에 대해서는 파악 못 하고 있습니다

translation.en: The fire claimed the lives of seven men, believed to be leaders
translation.ko: 화재로 목숨을 잃은 7명의 남성은 차이나타운의 악명 높은

translation.en: ♪ Can't you see I'm wide awake? -♪ Oh ♪
We could sell these at Master Wah's. Charge a big markup.
translation.ko: 이거 마스터 와에서 팔아도 되겠다 비싸게 받자

translation.en: How many times are we gonna go through this, Tommy?
You wouldn't go to the support group.
You dropped out of the outpatient program, you stopped seeing your sponsor.
translation.ko: 외래 치료도 관두고 후원자도 안 만나잖아

translation.en: You know, I-- I messed up, okay?
If you keep going like this, you're going to die.
What? Seriously. I don't ever wanna feel this shitty again--
translation.ko: 왜? 정말이야 다시는 이런 기분 느끼고 싶지 않다고
말도 안 되는 소리 하지 마!

translation.en: Do you know what happened last night? Somebody shot up a KTV parlor.
translation.ko: 어젯밤에 뭔 일이 있었는지 알아? 노래방에서 누가 총질했대

translation.en: Six people died. That could have been you.
Come on, Jenny, why would I go to a KTV parlor, huh?
translation.ko: 그건 아니지 제니야, 내가 노래방을 왜 가?

translation.en: We need to check you in somewhere. Get you some help.
translation.ko: 어디 가서 검사 좀 받아 보자 오빤 도움이 필요해

translation.en: Mom and Dad are here tomorrow. Remember that?
Try to keep it together until they leave, please.
translation.ko: 가시기 전까지 같이 잘해 보자 부탁이야

translation.en: We don't need them to know about this.
translation.ko: 엄마, 아빠가 이런 거 아실 필요 없잖아

translation.en: Buns are in the fridge. I am going to the TCM doctor later.
translation.ko: 빵은 냉장고에 있어 이따 한의사한테 갈 거야

translation.en: I'll pick you up some herbs.
Nobody gets out of the Triad.
And a little sister shouldn't have to take care of her goh goh like this.
translation.ko: 여동생이 오빠를 돌보게 하진 말았어야 했는데

translation.en: -[in English] We want them waddling out. -Okay. Yeah.
You forgot to drain the fat.
[in English] You taken on any business partners lately?
Why, you been spying on me?
There's some stuff going on. That's all.
translation.ko: 뭔가 있는 거 같아서 그래 그뿐이야

translation.en: Is this about what happened the other night?
Are you gonna answer my question?
My truck’s dead, Jenny. I need a job.
translation.ko: 내 트럭이 망가졌어, 제니 일자리가 필요해

translation.en: -I’m being mysterious. -No, you're not. You’re being weird.
translation.ko: - 나도 그런 게 좀 있어야지 - 아냐

translation.en: What is it that you’re not telling me?
translation.ko: 이상하게 굴잖아 나한테 숨기려는 게 뭐야?

translation.en: Six offered to set me up in a new restaurant.
translation.ko: 식스가 새 식당을 차려 주겠다고 했어

translation.en: I said no. Like I should have the first time.
translation.ko: 안 한다고 했지 처음부터 그랬어야 했는데

translation.en: for what I put you through.
Is that why you've been acting all squirrelly?
I'll get Jimmy to get you the menu.
I took a loan from Six.
That's how I paid for the remodel.
I did what I said I'd never do,
translation.ko: 식스가 우리 가게 도와준다고 했을 때

translation.en: when Six offered to bankroll our restaurant, and...
translation.ko: 절대 안 하겠다고 한 일을 해버렸어

translation.en: And don't pretend like you have. It's...
been a thing between us, and...
after all these years, I still feel like I'm trapped in that building.
translation.ko: 세월이 지났지만, 난 아직도 그 건물에 붙잡혀 있는 거 같아

translation.en: -He saved us. -And now he owns us.
translation.ko: - 엉클 식스가 구해준 거지 - 이젠 우릴 소유하고 있어

translation.en: I didn't realize how much, until these last few days.

translation.ko: 내가 바꿔 볼 수 있을지도 몰라

translation.en: You can't go up against Uncle Six, Kai.
translation.ko: 엉클 식스에겐 맞설 수 없어, 카이

translation.en: Slept on the couch last night.
I had to sneak out this morning without my coffee, so...
translation.ko: 아침에 커피도 못 마시고 몰래 나와야 했지

translation.en: See, that's why I live alone.
Only friend Bruce the goldfish? No, thank you.
You wanna tell me what the hell happened last night?
translation.ko: 어젯밤에 대체 무슨 일이 있었던 거야?

translation.en: Perks of living on the docks.
I'm a big girl living in a big city, Cap.
translation.ko: 전 대도시에 사는 성인 여자랍니다, 반장님

translation.en: This has nothing to do with the case, if that's what you're thinking.
translation.ko: 반장님 생각처럼 그 사건하고 관련 있는 건 아니에요

translation.en: I told you, this has nothing to do with the case.
McCullough iced six people at a karaoke bar last night.
I don’t wanna add a dead cop to that body count.
translation.ko: 시체 숫자에 경찰 한 명을 더 얹고 싶진 않다고

translation.en: You brought me in to close this case. I am close.
translation.ko: 이 사건 해결하라고 데려오신 거잖아요, 다 됐어요

translation.en: It would be impudent to introduce oneself so boldly to Chinatown
translation.ko: 내 관심을 끌 생각이 아니라면 차이나타운에 그렇게 대담하게
모습을 드러내진 않았겠지 여기 있을 거야

translation.en: But the chef only hurt Chen and Lau.
translation.ko: 그 요리사한테 당한 건 첸과 라우뿐입니다

translation.en: The Scotsman killed our brothers. Shouldn’t our energies be on him?
translation.ko: 스코틀랜드 놈이 우리 애들을 죽였습니다, 그놈한테 집중하시죠?

translation.en: [in Cantonese] A single spear and a single horse.
[in English] I will tend to the Scotsman when I see fit, personally.
translation.ko: 스코틀랜드 놈은 처리할 거야 때를 봐서, 개인적으로

translation.en: This chef is a threat to me.
Which means he's a threat to you...
If you can't find me this one bald chef...
translation.ko: 대머리 요리사 한 명을 못 찾겠다면

translation.en: -[in Cantonese] What are you doing? -Shut up, old man.
[in English] Where are you, Wu Assassin?
[in Cantonese] Mustard greens in the red bin.
[in English] I heard there was some excitement a few nights ago.
translation.ko: 며칠 전 밤에 재미있는 일이 있었다죠?

translation.en: Triad think I'm some old man,
translation.ko: 삼합회 녀석들이 날 어떤 늙은이인 줄 알았나 봐

translation.en: Do you need help, or anything?
Come inside, have some kok fa, huh?
an inconvenience is a unrecognized opportunity.
Young man like you have a long life ahead of you.
translation.ko: 자네 같은 젊은이들은 살날이 아주 많이 남았잖아 감사해야 해
살날이 아주 많이 남았잖아 감사해야 해

translation.en: -okay, it could be over in an instant. -[snaps fingers]
Especially when Eugene is trying to give me a heart attack!
translation.ko: 특히 유진이 날 심장 마비 걸리게 할 땐!

translation.en: Hey, you ever have any problem with the Triads, you know,
or anybody, just come to me.
Oh, no. I don't want your death on my conscience, okay?
translation.ko: 아냐, 네가 죽는 건 내 양심이 허락치 않아

translation.en: Let this old man take care of those assholes, huh?
translation.ko: 그런 놈들 처리하는 건 이 노인네한테 맡겨, 응?

translation.en: That would be a bad idea in this building.
translation.ko: 그런 변명은 이런 데선 안 맞죠

translation.en: I need to talk to you.
New ones, and ones very old.
Someone, a rival, is after me.
It's the life you have chosen.
I have no quarrel with the consequence of my vocation. It's...
translation.ko: 내가 한 일의 결과를 놓고 싸우고 싶진 않아

translation.en: I'm concerned this rival, or his people, might get to you.
translation.ko: 그놈이나 그 부하들이 너한테 접근할 수도 있어

translation.en: Use you to get to me.
This is your opportunity, Wu Assassin.
When the time is right, do not hesitate.
When did things go wrong between us, Kai?
translation.ko: 언제부터 우리 사이가 이렇게 틀어졌을까, 카이?

translation.en: I saw you for who you are.
And realized what I didn't want to be.

translation.ko: - 나한테 무슨 일이 생기면... - 넣어 두세요

translation.en: One day, you might see the world for the mass of gray it is.
translation.ko: 언젠가는 너도 세상이 회색빛이란 걸 알게 될 거다

translation.en: Maybe then, you won't judge me with such harshness.
translation.ko: 그때쯤 되면 나를 그렇게 혹독하게 판단하지 않을지도 몰라

translation.en: There are no true heroes or villains.
We are but two sides of the same coin.
more expensive than your other knives.
Yet you didn't throw it away.
That was your opportunity to kill the Fire Wu,
[in Cantonese] What are you doing? Hey, hey, who are you?
-[in English] What happened? -The Triad. They took Eugene.
They said I was protecting him. And that he was beating up the Triad.
translation.ko: 내가 유진을 비호했대 유진이 삼합회 조직원을 때렸고

translation.en: I told them he didn't do it, but they wouldn't listen.
translation.ko: 내가 유진이 아니라고 했지만 듣지도 않더라고

translation.en: Wait. Wait. My sister. If you lay a hand on her, I'll fucking--
translation.ko: 잠깐, 내 동생, 내 동생한테 손끝 하나라도 대면...

translation.en: -[Kai] They took Eugene from Mr. Young. -So?
If you’re involved in this, just get out of it.
translation.ko: 너도 엮인 거라면 그냥 손 떼라고

translation.en: Re-- Really? You start some peanut shit in my restaurant,
translation.ko: 그래? 네가 먼저 우리 식당 개판 만들었잖아

translation.en: Chen and Lau go missing, Six goes on the warpath,
translation.ko: 첸과 라우를 잃어서 식스가 완전 열받았어

translation.en: and suddenly you're all up in my grill? Like, what the fuck, Kai?
translation.ko: 근데 갑자기 나타나서 이래라저래라, 뭔 개수작이야

translation.en: [in Cantonese] No. Please. I didn't do anything.
translation.ko: 아니, 제발 전 아무 짓도 안 했어요

translation.en: [in English] What are you doing? Zan! Let him go.
translation.ko: 뭐 하는 거야? 잰! 아저씨를 놔줘!

translation.en: owner out of a bad situation once.
Oh. St. Peter's across the street.
translation.ko: 길 건너 세인트피터스 교회에서 사람을 보내거든

translation.en: They send people in here time to time, to try to save our souls.
translation.ko: 길 건너 세인트피터스 교회에서 사람을 보내거든 가끔씩, 우리 영혼을 구하겠다면서

translation.en: Ah, you're a little out of your jurisdiction, Inspector.
translation.ko: 관할을 조금 벗어난 거 같은데 형사 양반

translation.en: Well, how can I help you?
I wanted to ask you a few questions about your time in Chinatown.
translation.ko: 차이나타운에 있었던 시절 얘기 좀 해주세요

translation.en: Well, that was a long time ago, and my memory...
ain't what it used to be.
Tell me about the Hwa Song fire.
translation.ko: 화송 화재 사건 얘기가 듣고 싶은데요

translation.en: I checked with the precinct, and they said you hang out here.
translation.ko: 관할서에 문의하니까 여기에 있을 거라 하던데요
그날 밤 무슨 일이 있었죠? 뭘 봤어요?
그날 밤 무슨 일이 있었죠? 뭘 봤어요? 아무것도

translation.en: You've got a story. I can tell.
I was off that night. I should have minded my own fucking business.
translation.ko: 그날은 비번이었어 내 일이나 신경 썼어야 했는데

translation.en: I liked to have a few drinks now and then, take the edge off, loosen up.
translation.ko: 가끔 술 몇 잔씩 하는 걸 즐겼지 긴장을 좀 풀려고

translation.en: But I was a good cop.
And when you're a good cop, and you hear a 904B,
translation.ko: 훌륭한 경찰은 건물 화재를 뜻하는 904B 코드가 뜨면

translation.en: don't matter if you had a few drinks or not, you go and help.
When I got there, that fire was already ragin'.
translation.ko: 갔을 때는 이미 불이 맹렬하게 타오르고 있었고

translation.en: I mean, that heat was somethin' else.
You could feel it from across the street.
The-- The arson inspector said that that fire was so hot,
You know, I've seen a lot of arsons before. Up close.
translation.ko: 방화 사건을 가까이서 본 적이 많아

translation.en: it starts in one room, and then it spreads to the next room,
translation.ko: 한 방에서 시작해서 다음 방으로 퍼지고

translation.en: and it goes to the next room, like that. Boom, boom, boom, like that.
translation.ko: 또 그다음 방으로 퍼지지 빵, 빵, 빵 이렇게 말이야

translation.en: But this one, it was different. There was something all wrong.
It was different. It-- It moved like a snake.
translation.ko: 완전 이상했지, 달랐거든 불이 뱀처럼 움직인 거야

translation.en: It ate up that buildin' like that.
I mean, Jesus Christ, I thought it was gonna burn down all of Chinatown.
translation.ko: 세상에, 온 차이나타운이 다 타버리겠다고 생각했어

translation.en: Maybe even San Francisco, but it didn't.
It just stayed there in the Tong.
I wanted to help, but I just...
There’s nothing in the file or the news reports about dead kids.
translation.ko: 화재나 죽은 아이들에 대한 기사는 한 줄도 안 나왔어요

translation.en: The way that fire was burnin', they should have.
But they were saved by the monster.
I saw it separate the flames...
and control it. That's how those kids got out.
translation.ko: 통제하는 걸 봤다고 그렇게 애들을 데리고 나왔지

translation.en: They all got out, except for one. He was...
translation.ko: 전부 다 데리고 나왔는데 그중 한 명은...

translation.en: He was pretty fucked up, and I wanted to help,
but somethin' like that, that can control fire,
what the hell would it have done to me?
Is this the monster you saw?
translation.ko: 이 사람이 당신이 본 그 괴물인가요?

translation.en: I can't see that. I don’t have my glasses.
Uncle Six started the fire, didn’t he?
translation.ko: 엉클 식스가 불을 낸 거 아닌가요?

translation.en: -You had to have seen him there. -No.
translation.ko: 거기서 그를 본 게 분명해요 아냐

translation.en: Hi, it's Kai. Leave a message.
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 카이의 휴대폰입니다 메시지 남겨 주세요

translation.en: Hey, it's me. We need to talk. Call me.
translation.ko: 나야, 우리 얘기 좀 해, 전화해 줘

translation.en: You were at Master Wah's that night.
translation.ko: 넌 그날 밤에 마스터 와에 있었잖아
이 난리가 난 건 다 너 때문이야

translation.en: You could have just come to say hello.
[in English] Do you know who I am?
